factions.name: Shipwrigths
factions.desc: The assholes trying to take over the north coast.

factions.name: Duke Placeholder
factions.desc: The duke of the city and surrounding lands.

crossway.name: Crossway
crossway.desc: The intersection of two rivers and the capital of Cyruth

factions.name: The Royal Family
factions.desc: The leaders of the Cyruth Empire.

factions.name: Duke Placeholder
factions.desc: The nominal manager of the city and surrounding lands.

produs.name: Produs
produs.desc: A city built of woven rope amoung Lord Growth's branches.

factions.name: [link:high_court,growth]
factions.desc: Largely inactive, but if one does manage to anger it within it's branches, they will surely die

factions.name: The Council
factions.desc: The heads of the ruleing noble families

consumus.name: Consumus
consumus.desc: A city carved amoung Lord Growth's roots.

factions.name: [link:high_court,growth]
factions.desc: While less attentive here than amoung it's branches, attempting to harm it is still a fatal mistake.

factions.name: The Syndicate
factions.desc: Led by Lord Theft and Lady Poison, the syndicate represents the most powerful criminal element on Cyruth.

silvaar.name: Silvaar
silvaar.desc: The regional capital of the Sivaaran Mountains, Silvaar is held within the largest peak of the range. The smoke rising from it's numerous forges often makes the mountain look like a volcano.

factions.name: [link:high_court,mend] and [link:high_court,innovation]
factions.desc: The lords rule over silvaar, encoraging many disiplines of crafting, but with a focus on smithing.

faiwer.name: Faiwer Sea
faiwer.desc: A remarkably calm sea to the south or Cyruth.

factions.name: [link:high_court,sea]
factions.desc: Faiwer is the principle home and teritory of Lady Sea, who treats the area like a garden. While she allows fishing and travel to some extent, anyone who disturbs it is killed or bared from returning.

grendale.name: The Grendale Forest
grendale.desc: A massive forest in the north eastern part of Cyruth, covering nearly a fifth of the land. It is notable for having a high earth alignment and as the source of groed wood.

factions.name: The Lix
factions.desc: Despite the continued decline of their race, if is still dangerous to be alone in the deep forest

factions.name: The Imperial Legion
factions.desc: The Imperial Legion maintains a presence here, centered in Clearstream.

arena.name: The Arena
arena.desc: A city built in a massive crater left behind by a cataclysmic fight. Later fights left comparatively smaller craters that make up the city's many arenas.

factions.name: Soilders of Valor
factions.desc: Lord Valor's army is headquartered here, and many fights and fighters are sponsored by either the Lord himself or one of his officers.

factions.name: [link:organizations,northern_pirates]
factions.desc: The main hunting grounds of the pirates
